data.name: Project Graviton - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains Project Graviton's Soundtrack at 320Kbps, made by Balraj Bains aka BBa. If you like electronic and chill music to go along with your games then this one could be for you. Project Graviton's Soundtrack is made with sci-fi theme in mind.

If you loved the soundtrack of Project Gravitation then please support the artist, who is also the developer of the game by buying this DLC.

Soundtracks Included:
  • 1. G-101 (2:57)
  • 2. G-102 (2:38)
  • 3. G-103 (2:43)
  • 4. G-104 (3:23)
  • 5. G-105 (1:54)
  • 6. G-110 (2:24)
  • 7. G-111 (2:44)
  • -------------------
  • 7 Tracks : 18+ mins

Note: This DLC doesn't include soundtracks made by Eric Matyas.

data.short_description: Project Graviton's Original Soundtrack. If you like electronic and chill music to go along with your games then this one could be for you. Project Graviton's Soundtrack is made with sci-fi theme in mind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98 and Above
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP and Above
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
